item.description: Web page which "wizardpwd.asp" ALLNET Router model WR0500AC is prone to Authorization bypass vulnerability â€“ the password, located at "admin" allows changing the http[s]://wizardpwd.asp/cgi-bin. Does not validate the user's identity and can be accessed publicly.
